title: Strengthening Knowledge Sharing Competencies Through Collaborative Conceptual Framework Instruction on the Law of Energy Conservation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physics terminology and understanding of energy forms
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment leveraging managerial/leadership roles, enabling flexible participation via personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Explain the core concept of the Law of Energy Conservation with over 85% accuracy
Present three or more knowledge integration cases during collaborative processes with peers using the CSCCM tool
Demonstrate collaborative ability to visualize energy conversion processes through concept maps and adjust conflicting perspectives two or more times
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
